alert.note: Alert for Hand (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 10:27PM MST until January 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches mainly in the southern part of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Hand County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
